title: The gay MPs who opposed appeasement
itunes:title: The gay MPs who opposed appeasement
itunes:subtitle: Chris Bryant tells the story of a group of young, queer British MPs who were some of the first to resist appeasement and warn Britain’s government about the dangers of Hitler.
description:
MP and author Chris Bryant discusses his new book The Glamour Boys, which tells the story of group of young, queer British MPs who were some of the first to oppose appeasement in the 1930s and warn Britain’s government about the dangers of Hitler.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
